website_summaries.verdict: An extremely thorough curriculum based on methods developed for U.S. State Department Training. High school and possibly upper middle school.

cons: Beginner textbook is more helpful than intermediate or advanced level texts

Some languages focus just on the audio portion, but if I really want to communicate in Spanish, I need to know how to read it as well. (assuming I'm going to a Spanish-speaking country)
customer_reviews.author: RichA

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best lessons in language I've used. The package contains 4 CD's that starts with begining to advance matching books that give correct spelling & pronunciations. The book also contains practice exercise to inforce what you've laerned. There's also a blank note book helpful if you're a kinesthetic learner. The CD is arranged to give simple nouns then repeated and inforced with simple sentenses in later lessons. It also explains feminine masculine singular & plural. These lessons build on each other.
customer_reviews.author: 40's oldschool

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: Just a great value! I have no idea how they can sell all this for such a low price. Link your learning with [...] and you will be on the way to speaking Spanish quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wells

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this product. It is easy to understand the speakers on the cd. It gives you a great deal of information on the breakdown of Spanish terms.. It will take some time to become fluent in this language, but I look forward to the challenge. I'm glad I bought this and I would recommend it to others. It is a nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Em

customer_reviews.title: So I decided to get this and I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to learn Spanish since so many people around me speak it. However, I didn't want to spend the money on some of the more popular programs, nor did I have the time or money to go back to school. So I decided to get this and I'm so glad I did. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: CD's do not stay in the case
customer_reviews.text: I like the first CD lessons, however, they move quickly on the remaining CD's. So unless you understand everything on each previous lesson you will not understand the next lesson and so on. I purchased this to listen to in my car, but the CD case does not hold them in very well and they spill out easily. I would not recommend keeping them in the case in the car or you will have scratched up CD's. .
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great way of learning
customer_reviews.text: This complete set is wonderful. 3 different books to start from the very beginning and help you learn and CDs to follow the books 3 CDs for essentials 3 for intermediate 3 for advance. It recites the word in English than in Spanish! It is a great tool if you are on the road you can listen to the CDs while you are driving.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie

customer_reviews.title: Great course from well established teaching tool
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing MANY Spanish courses available online, and re-using one I purchased many years ago, I am very impressed with the latest Living Language Spanish, Complete Edition. My course arrived before it was scheduled to arrive and I've found it to be everything one could need to learn or, as in my case, re-learn Spanish. Why spend more for recognized names like Rosetta Stone when this well respected course can be had for less than 1/4 the cost?
customer_reviews.author: Henry L. Dewald

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Set up for beginners is very easy and simple to follow along. My only recommendation would be on the CDs to have more opportunities to practice. For example, when one lesson is done and you move on to the second lesson maybe a quick review of lesson one and lesson two and then gradually build on it from there.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great for Listening in Car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to listen to while I{m driving. I highly recommend it to anyone who wants to reinforce their Spanish study and to learn new vocabulary.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. ReevesTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value & Easy to learn a new langusge!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent format for learning conversational Spanish for the price! 9 CD's are included with lesson books. I am in Book 1 beginner & book offers pronounciation key, space to write word-ohrase. You will learn to speak & write in Spanish. Highly recommend this box set.
customer_reviews.author: chicagoSharon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on those other expensive language courses because this one is definitely a bargain. So far, I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good approach, with CD, workbook, and internet. I already have a beginner's capability that I am looking to bolster and reinforce so this starts a bit basic, but it is definitely better than the expensive popular internet services.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Brodsky

customer_reviews.title: Great but....
customer_reviews.text: This series is great for learning Spanish, but there are some errors in the book and I noticed about 8 of them. But the problem for me was they could have a done a better job explaining things and I know it's common sense but if they were more clearer on things it would have made it better.
customer_reviews.author: Blood Fire Death

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well organized and well written. Wish I had it when I was taking spanish in school!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for very low price
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very easy to use. Includes both books to read and CDs for the audio. So you not only learn to speak the language but you're also learning how to read and write it as you go. And costs a LOT less than those highly advertised programs.
customer_reviews.author: Rich and Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent program and format for learning!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent program, I feel like I’m in a a high school class, it is just a comprehensive. I’ve taken 5 years of Spanish between high school and college but lost it over the years. This program has a great method in teaching, along with a workbook. I’m pleased with this program and I’m only on Disc no. 2. I would recommend to anyone who is just starting out or looking to brush up and get back to where you were w/Spanish.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Really good brush up on a language
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this brush up for a trip I'm taking to Costa Rica. When you haven't spoken a language for a while, having a formal brush up is good. Would play in the car on my commute, and refresh with the booklet at home. Really happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good tool to learn Spanish. You have to be self-disciplined.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful aid to pickup conversational Spanish
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great value for the money. The combination of book and audio is what i liked most. And i supplemented this with Google searches to make sure the usage is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Ruckus

customer_reviews.title: ... still on the first few lessons but I really like it, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm still on the first few lessons but I really like it, especially for the price. Native speakers and lots of review, heck, it's very good. and I haven't even looked att he books yet
customer_reviews.author: gary w petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He is learning some. It moves quickly though so you need to re-listen to the cd's multiple times. Great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Beginner to advanced this is a winner!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was having some difficulty in her Spanish class and these Cd's put her over the top. We listen to them in the car & she plays them in her room. In a few short weeks she no longer needed a tutor and is excelling in her Spanish class. They also are teaching her real world phrases. I would recommend this to anyone learning or wanting to brush up on their Spanish. There are other programs out there but this one it amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Danka

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great cd and book
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this type of language cd and book before and have been somewhat happy with the purchases. This one far surpasses anything else I've seen or owned. The pace is perfect....not too slow, not too fast. The combination of vocabulary, verb tense, whole dialogues, questions, etc. provides the big picture right along with the important small details. I can't say enough about this series. It is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: KEHL

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly useful for the Language
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Living Language Set. I purchased this in Spanish and Japanese for myself. German and French for others. I can honestly say I am 100% impressed with ALL of these sets. The language instructions and pronunciations are clear. The Spanish set includes the: Essentials, Intermediate and Advanced book, as well as a notebook to take notes and 9 CD's (3 for each book). It also has a nice box that holds all of the material. The price is a great investment! I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The program is super easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The program is super easy to follow. You can also find exercises for each lesson on the website. It is really fun to work with this book. I already learned a lot in only 4 days. If you get stuck you can also sign up for the online course that is offered on the website. Looking forward of starting with the intermediate book soon.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Good program to learn Spanish
customer_reviews.text: Books and CDs arrived on time and in great condition (no shipping dents)...The chapters are set up well to learn the basics as you go...I can study while commuting to work and back with the CDs which is great. I recommend the full set to anyone interested...It is nice to have the extra workbook that is included in the set for writing assignments and to practice writing the words...
customer_reviews.author: louise.mills

customer_reviews.title: but I am very pleased with how comprehensive it is
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Living Language Spanish, Complete Edition a couple weeks ago for $28 and change. I've only used it a few times so far, but I am very pleased with how comprehensive it is. It is reviewed much higher than its VERY PRICEY competition, and I realize why. I am confident that when I really buckle down and devote my time to this course that I will have a good grasp of Spanish. Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Started reading this book but haven't had much time. Very helpful I would recommend this book. When I have more time I will definitely pick up the book again and start studying. Very helpful and informative!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Aubert

customer_reviews.title: CD's work great in the car while going back and forth to work.
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working great. I use it when I drive back and forth to work. I really don't have the time to just sit watch and speak, so I listen, and repeat the Spanish phrases over and over. I recommend this learning set to anyone on the go, and wanting to learn spanish.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Best for seniors or very basic beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Huge help! Supplements my Duolingo and Spanish reading books. Good basic exercises. Better for beginners or seniors, but still helpful.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Just fine but needs better exercise problems
customer_reviews.text: These books are just fine when it comes to introducing new vocabularies. However, the exercises are not helpful (both within the book and online), because all it does is repeat the exact same phrases shown within the dialogues or example sentences and does not help you with integrating the various vocabularies and concepts that you have learned. As a reference point, this is my 5th language that I am studying.
customer_reviews.author: SK
